name: Ruya
description:
FEATURES
◆ Challenge yourself with 64 handcrafted puzzles. Swipe, slide, pop, and release cute characters to progress and unfold Ruya's memories.

BEAUTIFUL & HEARTFELT
◆ Decorate Ruya in flowers as you play, and shake them off at the end of each level to purify Ruya's mind.
◆ A heartwarming illustrated visual narrative that will have you smiling.

SOUND
◆ Tweak binaural beats, allowing you to sink into a state of deep relaxation.
◆ The sound of rain, falling snow and whistling wind help to immerse you in 8 surrealist dreamscapes.
